attributes.action: During this crisis it would be good idea to help those who can't help themselves
attributes.additional_details:
To help those less able to fend for themselves and not have same effect in Italy and Spain
The big companies can help by allowing those people access to stores also the rationing of cleaning and sanitising materials
attributes.background:
Would it be possible for all supermarkets to  allow  the elderly  in to do their shopping for an hour in the mornings before the rest of us , as the shops will be stocked /cleaned and disinfected . 
This will help them physically and mentally to cope .

rejection.details: Since you started this petition, supermarkets have announced extra measures including shopping times and deliveries for vulnerable and older people.
